result.purpose: Contains additional documentation and resources related to the Fiber web framework.
result.architecture: The folder contains documentation files in Markdown format and a JSON file for metadata, structured to provide comprehensive information about the Fiber framework and its performance.

docs/extra/_category_.json.purpose: Defines metadata for extra contents in Fiber documentation.

docs/extra/benchmarks.md.purpose: Documentation of performance benchmarks comparing Fiber and other web frameworks.

docs/extra/faq.md.purpose: Documentation for frequently asked questions regarding the Fiber web framework.

docs/extra/internal.md.purpose: Documentation of the internal architecture of the Fiber web framework, detailing its structure, request handling flow, routing, and path parsing.

docs/extra/learning-resources.md.purpose: Documentation of interactive learning resources for mastering Fiber concepts.
